definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Village-in-city is a huge obstacle in the development of urbanization in China.
sentences.chinese: 城中村问题是中国城市化进程的一大障碍。

sentences.english: ThisThis paper makes a thorough study of the phenomenon of village in the city.
sentences.chinese: 本文对城中村现象进行了比较全面系统的研究。

sentences.english: The socialization plays its function at the aspects of the youth's transforming into citizen in the "village-in-city".
sentences.chinese: 而预期社会化将会对城中村青年的市民化发挥作用。

sentences.english: Transformation of City Village in Lanzhou adopted the construction of the resettlement mode of sub-procurement.
sentences.chinese: 兰州市的城中村改造采用了统建分购的安置模式。

sentences.english: At present, the issue of foreign Urban Villages there has no specific studies.
sentences.chinese: 目前，有关“城中村”问题国外尚没有专门的研究。

sentences.english: So it becomes a very good model for urban and village-based communities.
sentences.chinese: 因此它成为了城中村社区的一种非常好的模式。

sentences.english: With the high-speed development of a city, "City Village" has come into being as a special community.
sentences.chinese: 城中村是城市快速发展所形成的一种特殊社区。

sentences.english: Pictured is a male shirtless walk in the "Villages" in an alley.
sentences.chinese: 图为一男子赤膊走在“城中村”在一个小巷。

sentences.english: There are its deep reasons in production and development for the village in the city.
sentences.chinese: “城中村”的产生和发展有着其深层的原因。

sentences.english: Urban-village renovation is a requirement for the further development of the city.
sentences.chinese: 改造城中村是昆明进一步发展的需要。

sentences.english: In this paper, "Villages" construction-related issues are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文对“城中村”建设的相关问题加以论述。

definition: to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
Laocheng district of Luoyang City 洛陽市|洛阳市[Luo4 yang2 shi4], Henan
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
compound with many families living together
room constructed within an existing room/self-contained living area within a house or apartment
